entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2020-12-08 02:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2020-12-08 06:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Amsterdam instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Miami instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
Send email to customers was not changed. Tasks were not finished (hairpin) and will be completed on 12/11/2020.
